name: Fungy situation
description:
help Shroomy survive and flourish in this strange new place.

consume plant rubble to get more water and buy mushrooms to defend Shroomy.

this game was made for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3

I've  noticed that some of the GUI is missing and there isn't any sort of explanation about the mushroom types so I'll explain it here

Normal shroom: it costs 1 water, it has OK range, OK damage and OK shooting speed. it's a good mediocre mushroom

Red shroom: it costs 3 water, it has a very short range, it's pretty weak and it's shooting speed is very quick. 

Sniper shroom: it costs 5 water, it has great range, it's very strong and it has slow shooting speed.

Remember: less water is more chances of survival.  

So I found out by reading some of the comments that the GUI is missing, but on my computer you can see everything,  and that means that only 13.3 inch computer screens (AKA my laptops screen) are the only ones that can play the game well, which is very unfortunate.
